name: The Last Stand (itch) (Seagull Gaming)
description:
The Last Stand is a shooter game designed after The Prairie King from the game Stardew Valley. This game was designed as a personal challenge to myself to make a game in only one day. Since the timing lined up well, I also decided to participate in Mini Jam 110 with this game.

Jam theme and limitation: Sacrifice, Failure is Inevitable

NOTE: the tutorial is incorrect, in order to use a heart you need to press space. I can't update it until tomorrow, so for now I'm making this note.
